channel.title: Seeing the light.....
channel.description: To list all the Foss ( Free and Open Source) events happening in India.

item.title: Fudcon Pune 26-28 June
item.description:
Event date: 
Fri, 26/06/2015 - 09:00 - Sun, 28/06/2015 - 18:00

FUDCon is the Fedora Users and Developers Conference, a major free software event held in various regions around the world, usually annually per region.

FUDCon is a mix of sessions. There are talks that range from technology introductions to deep dives, hands-on workshops, BoFs where like-minded people get together to discuss a project or technology and hackfests where contributors work on specific initiatives. Topics include infrastructure, feature development, community building, general management and governance, marketing, testing and QA, packaging, etc.

read more
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: conf.kde.in 2015
item.description:
Event date: 
Fri, 17/04/2015 - 16:06 - Sat, 18/04/2015 - 16:06

conf.kde.in is a platform for Qt/KDE contributors, developers and enthusiasts to come together, share their knowledge, contribute, learn and play. Most importantly it's an excellent arena for collaboration and exchange of ideas, skills and thoughts among like minded people passionate about open source in general.

read more
item.dc:creator: harishnavnit

item.title: DrupalCamp Hyderabad 2015 , 7-8 March 2015
item.description:
Event date: 
Sat, 07/03/2015 - 10:00 - Sun, 08/03/2015 - 18:00

DrupalCamp Hyderabad is coming back after 5 years do try to come and hangout

http://2015.drupalhyderabad.org/
item.dc:creator: satyaakam

item.title: PyBelgaum , Karnataka
item.description:
Event date: 
Sat, 28/02/2015 - 09:00 - Sun, 01/03/2015 - 18:00

PyBelgaum 2015 is a local Python conference happening in Belgaum. It is conducted by the Python community on using and developing the Python programming language. It's a 2-day conference, hosted by GIT Engineering College, Belgaum.

call for proposals http://junction.pybelgaum.org/pybelgaum/proposals/

http://pybelgaum.org/2015/
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: Drupal Camp Delhi 2015
item.description:
Event date: 
Sat, 10/01/2015 - 09:00 - Sun, 11/01/2015 - 18:00

Drupal Camp Delhi (DCD) is the largest watering hole for the Drupal community in India, and the most consistently held Drupal event across the country. It brings together the Drupal developer, business and student user community. DCD is organized by the Indian Drupal community, in association with the Free Software Foundation of India.

DCD Novâ€™11 witnessed some eminent Drupal personalities like Dries Buytaert, the creator of Drupal and his colleagues Jacob Singh and Ron Pruett - both in senior management positions at Acquia.

read more
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: SciPy India 2014
item.description:
Event date: 
Fri, 05/12/2014 - 13:30 - Sun, 07/12/2014 - 13:30

The registration for SciPy India 2014 (http://scipy.in) is open.
SciPy India 2014 will be held in IIT Bombay between December 5th to
December 7th, 2014.

SciPy India is an annual conference on using Python for science and
engineering research and education. The conference is currently in its
sixth year and provides an opportunity to learn and implement Python in
education and research.

For registering and proposing your paper, visit http://scipy.in
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: DebUtsav14
item.description:
Event date: 
Fri, 17/10/2014 - 09:00 - Sat, 18/10/2014 - 09:00

DebUtsav is an amazing platform for any student who is passionate to experience the magic of open source. It is a great opportunity for developers, contributors and other interested people to meet the veterans in open source software development, develop professional connections, chat with contributors who can guide you, present in front of a grand audience, and also comprehend the essence of open source development. This conference will be beneficial for developing key components of the Debian system, infrastructure and community.

read more
item.dc:creator: AnirudhAnand

item.title: Software Freedom Day 2014 Celebrations In Cochin
item.description:
Event date: 
Sun, 21/09/2014 - 12:56 - Mon, 22/09/2014 - 12:56

Hi,

It is our great pleasure to welcome you to the Software Freedom Day (SFD) celebration organized by Angamaly Linux User Group in association with http://itpublic.in and GNUPARK on September 20, 21, 22 2014. (20th at Angamaly and 21st ,22nd 2014 at CUSAT.)

Celebration At Angamaly.

item.description:

Sat, 20/09/2014 - 16:30 - 18:52

Hi,

It is our great pleasure to welcome you to the Software Freedom Day (SFD) celebration organized by Angamaly Linux User Group in association with http://itpublic.in and GNUPARK on September 20, 21, 22 2014. (20th at Angamaly and 21st ,22nd 2014 at CUSAT.)

item.dc:creator: librecochin

item.title: Deccan RubyConf 2014 , 19th July , Pune
item.description:
Event date: 
Sat, 19/07/2014 - 00:09 - 05:30

Deccan Ruby conference is being held in Pune on 19th July in Pune. You can
check out the details here - http://www.deccanrubyconf.org/

There is also a student sponsorship available for the conference. Students
can use this opportunity to get a free pass to all the events of the
conference. Note that there are a limited number of student sponsorships
available, so students with some open source contributions and
participation will get preference. Interested students can apply here -
http://goo.gl/npTRPZ
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: Apache India MiniConference 2014 ,Bangalore
item.description:
Event date: 
Tue, 06/05/2014 - 09:00 - 18:00

Join us at the first edition of the Apache India Mini Conference, taking place on May 6, 2013 at the beautiful campus of InMobi and be a part of the history. Apache India Mini Conference is a premier Apache Software Foundation (ASF) event in Bangalore that about multiple sessions on Apache top-level projects. Designed around the theme Cloud and Data Handling, this half-day Open Source gathering presents an excellent opportunity to connect with a unique blend of Apache community members, developers, users, and industry leaders.

read more
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: Ubuntu 14.04 Release Party - Cochin
item.description:
Event date: 
Sun, 20/04/2014 - 15:00 - 16:30

Come celebrate the release of the latest and most awesome version of Ubuntu yet - Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (Trusty Tahr).

Ubuntu 14.04 installation images will be available at the venue.

LTS release parties are always a great time! We look forward to seeing you on April 20th!

http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/indian-team/2766-ubuntu-1404-release-party...
https://plus.google.com/u/0/108103458354293242983/posts/g66puGZYgyv
https://www.facebook.com/events/1437353479841112/?ref_newsfeed_story_typ...

Conducted by ILUG-Cochin.org members, http://ilug-cochin.org

Contact Details :

item.dc:creator: librecochin

item.title: BootConf 2014
item.description:
Event date: 
Sat, 22/03/2014 - 10:30 - Sun, 23/03/2014 - 05:00

Are you around Delhi the coming weekend of 22nd March, 2014? We have
some great news for you and that is "BootConf 2014"!

BootConf 2014, is a technical conference specifically target on Free and Open Source
Software and Open Hardware -- anything that encourages the spirit of sharing,
openness and innovation.

We are organizing BootConf 2014 for the people like you you, with curious minds and
open heart. Lets get together to explore some Free and Open Source technologies
and maybe learn something new.

What should you expect at BootConf 2014?

read more
item.dc:creator: tuxdna

item.title: Carte Blanche 2014 , Explore your Freedom 15th Feb-16 Feb 2014
item.description:
Event date: 
Sat, 15/02/2014 - 09:00 - Sun, 16/02/2014 - 18:00

Computer Society of MIT , a student
organisation of Madras Institute of Technology, Anna university,
Chennai conducts its annual Fest Carte Blanche every year which is a Technical & Free and open Source Software Fest.

The occasion of the event for this year will be celebrated on
'February 15 & 16, 2014'. This fest is mainly intend to promote the awareness about the usage of Free and open Source Software to the both college & School Students and Public.

For other details about Carte Blanche'14 visit http://cb.csmit.org

For further info contact,

Mathan Kumar : +91-7708345348

read more
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: "Free Software, Free Society" : Talk By RMS
item.description:
Event date: 
Tue, 21/01/2014 - 12:00 - 15:00

The Free Software Movement campaigns for computer users' freedom to cooperate and control their own computing. The Free Software Movement developed the GNU operating system, typically used together with the kernel Linux, specifically to make these freedoms possible.

This speech by Richard Stallman will be nontechnical, admission is free, and the public is encouraged to attend.

Please fill out our contact form, so that we can contact you about future events in and around Mumbai.

http://www.fsf.org/events/20140121-mumbai
item.dc:creator: administrator

item.title: "Free Software and Your Freedom" : RMS Talk
item.description:
Event date: 
Sun, 19/01/2014 - 14:30 - 17:00

Richard Matthew Stallman,American software freedom activist is going to enrich us with his pre-fest lecture. The founder of GNU project,RMS is here for an EML to speak about the Free Software Movement campaign for computer users' freedom to cooperate and control their own computing.
Venue:IIT Hyderabad
Date: 19th January
Time: 2:30 pm

The Free Software Movement developed the GNU operating system, typically used together with the kernel Linux,
specifically to make these freedoms possible.

To know more about him and Free software foundation,

read more

item.title: ILUG Cochin (Indian Libre User Group) Meeting on December 22nd
item.description:
Event date: 
Sun, 22/12/2013 - 14:30 - 17:30

Warm Greetings To You,

Indian Libre User Group is spreading Free Software awareness in society
through its regular monthly meetings ( 4th Sunday of every month ),
conducted since 1997. ILUG Cochin (www.ilug-cochin.org) is holding its
regular meeting for this month on Sunday, 22nd December 2013.

The Details are as follows

Date : 22/12/2013, 22nd December, Sunday

Time : 2pm - 5:30pm

Venue :
Internet Club
IInd Floor, AMI Trust Bldg,
Broadway Enclave
Broadway,
Kochi-682031
Location: Behind Allappat Super Shoppe,On top of SBT Treasury wing

Meeting Schedule

item.title: conf.KDE.in
item.description:
Event date: 
Fri, 21/02/2014 - 09:00 - Sun, 23/02/2014 - 18:00

conf.kde.in is a platform for Qt and KDE contributors and enthusiasts to meet up, share their knowledge, contribute, learn, play, and most importantly have fun. It is the perfect arena for collaboration and exchange of ideas, skills, thoughts among like minded people who are passionate about open source.

Drupal Camp Delhi (DCD) is the largest watering hole for the Drupal community in India, and the most consistently held Drupal event across the country. It brings together the Drupal developer, business and student user community. DCD is organized by the Indian Drupal community, in association with the Free Software Foundation of India.
